issue.title: [Feature/extensions] Handles version conflicts for AD Extension

repository.name: OpenSearch
repository.description: 🔎 Open source distributed and RESTful search engine.

issue.body:
Signed-off-by: Owais Kazi <owaiskazi19@gmail.com>

### Description
`jackson 2.13.3` brings a transitive dependency of `snakeyml:1.30` which has a CVE and also conflict with other dependencies for AD exetension 

Companion PR on AD: https://github.com/opensearch-project/anomaly-detection/pull/672
SDK: https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/pull/145

### Issues Resolved
[List any issues this PR will resolve]

### Check List
- [ ] New functionality includes testing.
  - [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] New functionality has been documented.
  - [ ] New functionality has javadoc added
- [ ] Commits are signed per the DCO using --signoff
- [ ] Commit changes are listed out in CHANGELOG.md file (See: [Changelog](../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#changelog))

### Gradle Check (Jenkins) Run Completed with:
* **RESULT:** SUCCESS :white_check_mark:

* **CommitID:** 3849f4b38f7df1233ff57368affd5a9dbb8304c7

### Gradle Check (Jenkins) Run Completed with:
* **RESULT:** SUCCESS :white_check_mark:
* **URL:** https://build.ci.opensearch.org/job/gradle-check/3220/
* **CommitID:** bd9e8d03490fcc0ad067209a655ede521a674166

The backport to `2.x` failed:
```
The process '/usr/bin/git' failed with exit code 1
```
To backport manually, run these commands in your terminal:
```bash
# Fetch latest updates from GitHub
git fetch
# Create a new working tree
git worktree add .worktrees/backport-2.x 2.x
# Navigate to the new working tree
cd .worktrees/backport-2.x
# Create a new branch
git switch --create backport/backport-4556-to-2.x
# Cherry-pick the merged commit of this pull request and resolve the conflicts
git cherry-pick -x --mainline 1 658f7a63ed160d63f9117ef0227d2ad875e558b6
# Push it to GitHub
git push --set-upstream origin backport/backport-4556-to-2.x
# Go back to the original working tree
cd ../..
# Delete the working tree
git worktree remove .worktrees/backport-2.x
```
Then, create a pull request where the `base` branch is `2.x` and the `compare`/`head` branch is `backport/backport-4556-to-2.x`.

issue.title: [Feature/extensions] Removed opensearchplugin and extension runs independently

repository.name: anomaly-detection
repository.description: Identify atypical data and receive automatic notifications

issue.body:
Signed-off-by: Owais Kazi <owaiskazi19@gmail.com>

### Description
This PR makes the extension run independently and removes the dependency on `opensearchplugin`. For now tasks such as `publishing` and `bundlePlugin` are taken care of. `integTest` will be done by creating a new framework for integration tests here https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/120. The remaining tasks are P1 and will be done in https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/144.

It also integrates the local published SDK with AD build.gradle and has a main class to run the extension from. 
For now, the sample RestHandler is integrated but later with https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/58 it will be replaced with create Index.

Companion PR on OpenSearch: https://github.com/opensearch-project/OpenSearch/pull/4556
SDK: https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/pull/153

### Issues Resolved
https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/133 and https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/137

By submitting this pull request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the Apache 2.0 license.
For more information on following Developer Certificate of Origin and signing off your commits, please check [here](https://github.com/opensearch-project/OpenSearch/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md#developer-certificate-of-origin).
